articles.title: The Porsche 911 Club Coupe Is a Carrera T, But Rarer - Motor1.com
articles.description: Porsche will build just 70 of these 911 Carrera T models in honor of the Porsche Club of America's 70th birthday.

articles.author: MLB.com
articles.title: LIVE on ESPN: Full All-Star Game rosters revealed - MLB.com
articles.description:
The full rosters for the 2025 All-Star Game are here!
Major League Baseball announced the rosters for the American League and National League on Sunday, adding the pitchers and reserves to the fan-elected starting lineups that were revealed on July 2.
